hero.description: From CAD to final part in high-performance composites. 350°C chambers to print the impossible.

materials.header_desc: Select a category to view available options for your application.

general.title: Rapid Prototyping
general.desc: Excellent cost-benefit materials with great visual finish for shape validation.

items.name: PLA Premium
items.desc: Great surface finish for visual models. Easy printing.

items.name: Translucent PETG
items.desc: Good mechanical resistance and slight flexibility. Ideal for containers.

items.name: TPU (Flex A95)
items.desc: Elastomer with rubber properties. For seals and dampers.

engineering.title: Engineering Grade
engineering.desc: Robust technical polymers to replace end-use parts, withstanding heat, impact, and friction.

items.name: Industrial ABS
items.desc: Standard for durable parts. Good thermal resistance (up to 85°C).

items.name: ASA UV-Resist
items.desc: The 'Outdoor ABS'. Does not degrade or yellow under sunlight.

items.name: PC (Polycarbonate)
items.desc: Extreme impact resistance and high temperature (110°C+).

items.name: Nylon PA12/PA6
items.desc: Exceptional toughness, low friction, and chemical resistance.

advanced.title: High Performance
advanced.desc: The pinnacle of additive manufacturing. Reinforced composites and superpolymers for extreme environments.

items.name: Carbon Fiber (PA-CF)
items.desc: Nylon reinforced with carbon fiber. Maximum structural rigidity.

items.name: Glass Fiber (PA-GF)
items.desc: Superior dimensional stability and electrical/thermal insulation.

items.name: PEEK / PPS
items.desc: Metal replacement. Resists aggressive chemicals, fire, and 200°C+.

why.title: Precision Additive
why.subtitle: We overcome conventional 3D printing limitations with industrial hardware and rigorous process control.

items.title: 80°C Heated Chamber
items.desc: Controlled environment that eliminates warping in large ABS and ASA parts.

items.title: 24h Quoting
items.desc: Get technical analysis and pricing quickly.

items.title: Z-Axis Isotropy
items.desc: Superior chemical layer fusion, ensuring mechanical strength in all directions.

items.title: Real Materials
items.desc: We process PEEK, Carbon Fiber, and Nylon without internal stresses.

tech.title: Extreme Thermal
tech.desc: Real 3D printing requires control. Our active heated chamber ensures polymers like ABS and Nylon have injection-molded mechanical strength.

items.title: Hardened Nozzle
items.desc: Prints Carbon Fiber for thousands of hours.
